page.title: 14RECREATION IN ST. TEATH
page.content: ALTHOUGH SOME OLDER RESIDENTS MAINTAIN THAT THE VILLAGE COMMUNITY SPIRIT HAS DIMINISHED OVER THE YEARS, MOST FEEL A STRONG SENSE OF BELONGING TO ST. TEATH AND APPRECIATE VARIOUS CLUBS, GROUPS AND ACTIVITIES WHICH TAKE PLACE REGULARLY.LOCAL CLUBS INCLUDE:LOCAL HISTORY GROUP;WOMENS INSTITUTE; BADMINTON;SENIOR CITIZENS; PLAYGROUP;OLDE TYME AND MODERN SEQUENCE DANCING;MOTHERS UNION; BRIGHT HOUR;FOOTBALL CLUB;ST.TEATH SCHOOL PTA; WHITE HART POOL AND DARTS TEAMS; AND COMMUNITY CENTRE SNOOKER TEAM. HOWEVER,DESPITE THESE MANY ACTIVITIES, THERE IS A DISTINCT LACK OF FACILITIES IN THE VILLAGE FOR YOUNG PEOPLE WHO HAVE TO TRAVEL TO NEARBY TOWNS FOR THEIR ENTERTAINMENT.A COMMUNITY CENTRE HAS BEEN OPENED TO PROVIDE A MEETING PLACE FOR YOUNG AND OLD ALIKE PROVIDING VARIOUS FACILITIES.
